C

choseCharacter() - Method in class Game
Allows the user to select a character, either a mage or a warrior, and equips the character with the appropriate weapon and defensive equipment.
choseClassType() - Method in class Menu
Prompts the user to choose a character class between mage and warrior.
choseMenu() - Method in class Menu
Displays the main menu to the user and allows them to choose between creating a character or quitting the game.
choseName() - Method in class Menu
Prompts the user to enter a name for their character.
clearScreen() - Method in class Menu
Clears the console screen.
createBoard() - Method in class Game
Creates the game board with 64 tiles and randomly assigns encounters.

Displays a menu for rolling dice, viewing character statistics, or quitting the game.

Menu - Class in Unnamed Package
The Menu class handles the user interactions in the game, including displaying various menus, reading input from the player, and printing various messages or visuals.
Menu() - Constructor for class Menu
Constructs a new Menu and initializes the Scanner for user input.

P

printDices() - Method in class Menu
Displays a visual representation of the dice and prompts the user to roll the dice to begin the game.
printDragon() - Method in class Menu
Prints a dragon ASCII art to the console as part of the menu display.
printInvalidClass() - Method in class Menu
Prints an error message indicating that the user has selected an invalid character class.
printLose() - Method in class Menu
Displays to the player a lose sentence.
printPersonnage(Personnage) - Method in class Menu
Displays the details of the given Personnage by calling its toString method.
printSingleDice(int) - Method in class Menu
Displays a visual representation of a single die based on the user's choice.
printTileEvent(Case) - Method in class Menu
Prints the event associated with a given tile depending on the player position on the board.

S

showDiceThrow() - Method in class Menu
Show result of the random (1-6) dice throw.
showPlayerTile(int) - Method in class Menu
Displays the result of a dice throw in a formatted message.
startGame() - Method in class Game
Starts the game and presents the initial menu to the user.

W
